name: Zombies Revenge
description:
Zombies Revenge

Hello Friends,Zombies have been attacked on the city to take their revenge and you have to save your city from the zombies attack,download this game and save a city from the attack of zombie,save your city from the zombie and become a super hero of the city,take your favorite weapons and kill the zombies by using that weapons.kill all the zombies and make a score,zombies will become too dangerous when you will going to kill them,so be careful and kill the zombie. This is survival game,you have to survivor during each difficult level and complete this Zombie survivor game.This game is made for all types of generations.download this game and have a lot's of fun

Key Features of this game.

-> Have a great collections of different weapons

-> effective View

-> User friendly game

This is different for other survival games & survivor games.
